title: 2001 Gujarat Earthquake
description: Epicenter near Bhuj, caused widespread damage and over 20,000 casualties.

title: 2011 Sikkim Earthquake
description: Affected India, Nepal, Bhutan and Tibet with significant damage in mountainous regions.

title: 2015 Manipur Earthquake
description: Epicenter in Tamenglong district, affected North-East India and Bangladesh.
